cleaned_text: Immune Boost Energy Healing This is the time of year to release everything that is in your system that is making you vulnerable to illness and disease. There are many influences that contribute to us falling ill, from mental, emotional and financial stress to physical holding of old illness patterns. Add to this the yearly cycle of the flu virus and our immune system can become run down and susceptible to sickness. Other factors that can compromise our physical health are the negative effects of medicines, strong negative charges such as electromagnetic fields and environmental conditions like chemtrails and heavy metal exposure. All illnesses and diseases have specific frequencies and we carry many such frequencies within us. We also hold many belief systems about getting sick that have been passed on to us from family, society and the medical profession and now have become part of mass consciousness belief. With so many things going on in and around us it is easy for our immune systems to become overwhelmed and for our bodies to lock down into sickness. Besides doing all of the things that we know to do like getting enough rest, proper supplementation for our immune system and seeing our doctor if need be; this specialized Christa Healing will help you bolster your immune system as it releases the energies that are weakening it and making you susceptible to getting sick. During the healing session you will be separated from all of the influences enabling you to hold strong positive energy around your ability to stay well. The Christa Healing Method uses powerful healing energies to release the energy of viruses and pathogens. The stress in our daily lives is also a factor in our "catching" a cold or flu virus. Stress energy creates inflammation which makes an environment that is conducive to these viruses taking hold. During this healing session I will release the stress, inflammation and irritation frequencies that attract virus energy and holds it in your body. Being emotionally overwhelmed also contributes to us becoming imbalanced and lowers our vibration. Held emotional energy will be released to help you restore balance to your system. Restorative and rejuvenating healing energies will be used to rebuild and bolster your immune system at the end of the session. When you can hold your energy at a higher vibration then illness and disease, you can stay well no matter what is going on around you. Schedule your Energy Immune Booster Christa Healing today!
